name: Nature`s Secrets Turmeric Face Wash
description: Be the centre of attention with a youthful gold glow. Discover an improved skin tone, reduced pimples and protected skin, gently cared for by natural anti-bacterial and skin improving properties of Neem & Turmeric. Skin Friendly at pH 5.5-6.0 and 100% soap free. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
